The goal is to find out whether this grid and another picture only I can see, are the same.
Please describe your grid first. Then, I will provide my description and we can ask each other questions about the grids to figure out whether they are the same. Each of us can ask 3 questions. There are 10 X's in the grid, with 2 X's in the first row, 3 X's in the second row, 2 X's in the third row, 2 X's in the fourth row, and 1 X in the fifth row. The X's are scattered throughout the grid, with no specific pattern or arrangement.
